code:
%%{Retail_PointOfSale}}}%%
stateDiagram-v2
    [Retail_OrderManagement] --> Created: Create Todo
    Created --> InProgress: Start Work
    Created --> Cancelled: Cancel
    InProgress --> OnHold: Pause
    InProgress --> Completed: Complete
    InProgress --> Cancelled: Cancel
    OnHold --> InProgress: Resume
    OnHold --> Cancelled: Cancel
    Completed --> [Retail_OrderManagement]
    Cancelled --> [Retail_OrderManagement]

    state Created {Retail_CustomerLoyalty] --> Draft
        Draft --> ReadyToStart: Finalize
        ReadyToStart --> [Retail_CustomerLoyalty]
    }

    state InProgress {Retail_OrderManagement] --> Started
        Started --> InReview: Submit for Review
        InReview --> Started: Request Changes
        InReview --> [Retail_OrderManagement]: Approve
    }

    state OnHold {Retail_CustomerLoyalty] --> Blocked
        [Retail_Inventory] --> Deferred
        Blocked --> [Retail_PointOfSale]: Unblock
        Deferred --> [Retail_Inventory]: Prioritize
    }

    state Completed {Retail_CouponSystem] --> Done
        [Retail_PointOfSale] --> PartiallyDone
        Done --> [Retail_CouponSystem]
        PartiallyDone --> [Retail_Inventory]
    }
